description:
The 1010 Life will help you create a biblically-based life plan.

  • 1010 Body will provide all the insight and training needed to create a healthy lifestyle and body to serve the Lord for years to come.
  • 1010 Beliefs will help you focus on the right areas while decreasing negativity and reactive thinking. It will show you how to use the painful areas of life to be a blessing to others. You will also stop worrying so much about what other people think of you.
  • 1010 Business gives you an exact framework to create a powerful online business. You can use this plan at your own website or here on Udemy.
title: The 1010 Christian Life Plan
